Tigerhawk/Depth Charge/Cheetor/Rhinox




As they all see Fireblade attacking the ship they turn there guns at 
him.


Tigerhawk fires 15 bullets at him.  Cheetor connects his blades and 
fires a green blast at Fireblade. Rhinox fires 25 bullets.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Depth Charge flys up to Prowl. "need some help?"
